website_summaries.verdict: A high quality bag to protect your high quality optics – heavy-duty on the outside and fully padded on the inside.
pros: Made of rugged, water-resistant polyester and nylon material
Holds up in travel to harsher environments
Interior is soft and separated into 2 compartments for scope and tripod with a thick pad to prevent damage
Will fit other models of telescopes than Orion within the bag’s dimensions of 47 inches by 11 inches by 14 inches
cons: Lacks a shoulder strap and inner compartments for accessories
Too tight a squeeze without completely disassembling some telescopes to fit

customer_reviews.title: Light, but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a large refractor telescope (132mm triplet) that usually has a camera, filter wheel, and adapters attached. Weighs about 30 lbs. Straps are long enough to fit on my shoulder, so one hand is free for maneuvering through doors, etc. Much handier than hard case. Padding is pretty good for use around home, in car, or storage. Would not ship in it, or use for air travel.
customer_reviews.author: lakerunr

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Scope
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. My problem is the weight of my scope, tripod, mount, and counter weights added up to over 80lbs. Returning it for 2 cases, one for tripod, mount, and counter weights, and one for the scope Three days later... However, I decided to keep this case for my scope. It is well padded and will serve me well. I will also look for a case for my tripod and counterweights.
customer_reviews.author: Threedog

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit but adequate.
customer_reviews.text: When I got this is really expected a better fit, and more predictable place for all of the various parts. Cons: No instructions on where things should go so I had to hunt to find them. Takes far too long to pack up with this bag. Same your money and get a foam padded hard case
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Moon

customer_reviews.title: 2017 Celestron AstroMaster 90AZ fits!
customer_reviews.text: I fit my Celestron AstroMaster 90AZ in with room to spare. I put a fleece throw on the bottom of the telescope side and I feel it has good padding for transport to star parties. I did not have to take the telescope apart, it is in intact and it fits with a couple inches to spare in length! The AltAz tripod fits great along tray. The other reviews have already pointed out the negatives. I'm happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Very good solution for carrying and protecting a 5" refractor telescope
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed with good ballistic fabric. I would prefer two smaller cases, one for the 'scope and one for the mount and tripod, because by the time you reach a 5" telescope they are getting sort of heavy. But this one is fitted with well-placed, padded separators so the telescope is protected pretty well. Handles are located well and are easy to grasp. I have been looking for something like this for some time and I am surprised that Celestron and Meade don't offer something like it. That's okay, because this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Inkblots

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case to go along with the Orion 09007 SpaceProbe 130 ST Equatorial Reflector telescope which I gave as a 30th birthday gift to my younger son. He's so pleased with the case. He said everything fits very well and the case provides a great way to store the telescope.
customer_reviews.author: Domino

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits everything as expected. Would like it to be a few inches larger when carrying both telescope and tripod but they do fit. There are no pockets for small accessories which would be nice. Padding is sufficient for good protection.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but if I could find a hard case that the telescope and tripod fit in I probably would buy it. Had to take mostly all apart to fit into case. Since the tripod and telescope and tripod, and other loose pieces are in there, I would prefer more padding, and better divider, maybe a stiffer bottom. It was supposed to be for my telescope. but barely fit
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!! Great fit for Orion SpaceProbe 130st  Telescope with accessories
customer_reviews.text: Love this Product!!! It keeps my Orion SpaceProbe 130 St Telescope safe. I can also fit inside the mount, counterweight and tray, inside as well. I also had some eyepieces and accessories inside but took them out when got another case just for the eyepieces. Is built very sturdy and durable, it mentions its waterproof but I haven't tested and hope not too anytime soon. Straps are long enough that you can carry on your shoulder. Only downside is it starts to hurt your shoulder if you carry it around too long. Other than that great product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: I love the case as it easily holds and protects the ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed this larger size for my Orion EON 120mmED scope that has my Celestron 80ED piggybacked on it. I love the case as it easily holds and protects the scopes.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: We're new to the stargazing community and inherited a very nice Orion scope. This bag has come in handy for transporting the majority of our gear. It's padded and the tube straps down nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a much needed bag! My telescope is finally not in a box but in a protected case!
customer_reviews.author: Judit B.

customer_reviews.title: Very large and nicely padded.
customer_reviews.text: Great carrying bag but would be much better if it had some inside pockets.
customer_reviews.author: shawn p gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the telescope that they had at Costco last Christmas - 2014.
customer_reviews.text: I would imagine that it is universal enough for any low to mid range telescope.
customer_reviews.author: DaveWGentry

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my telescope
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Works great for my telescope. I had to break down my tripod and parts of telescope for it to fit well in bag.
customer_reviews.author: adan cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for transporting a refractor and tripod, or 2 refractors.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Could use better documentation.
customer_reviews.text: It's not clear how best to fit Orion Spaceprobe into this bag nicely. Better instructions with more diagrams would be welcome, even if they were hosted online.
customer_reviews.author: dmomo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is nice, but hard to figure out the best way to put the telescope in.
customer_reviews.author: Overachiever

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: protects my Explore Scientific AR series 152mm telescope quite well. no room for anything else, though
customer_reviews.author: Hador_NYC

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag Overall
customer_reviews.text: The material seems to be sturdy and my Celestron Nexstar 130SLT telescope fit in the bag, as well as the mount and tripod. My only suggestion to Orion is to include pockets to store ancillary items.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K. Saulter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: Used for over 7 years w/ different scopes. It's Large and is heavy duty!!! Carry Scopes, stands, etc. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: John F. Fowlds Jr.

customer_reviews.title: perfect bag !
customer_reviews.text: this is a very sturdy and well made bag and holds everythng needed as well as keeping it safe from damage.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Meeter

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bag
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality storage bag, nicely paded. Have been using this bag for 1 year now, it still is like new. Use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: B Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Listed dementions are correct, the material is of a good quality, and the picture is accurate. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Mac Donald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As with everything I have purchased from Orion, the case met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very good case!
customer_reviews.text: My Astroview 6 fits very well with this case, and I have some space to another accessories. Help to protect against shocks while transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: It all fits
customer_reviews.text: though it could be a little taller to fit the 6 inch Newtonian, the only part I decided not to store in the bag is the weights
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hiser

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I use this case for a Celestron Omni XLT 150 reflector. This size fit perfectly for this scope, with room for the OTA, mount, tripod, 4 eyepieces with individual boxes, a night red light and a Telrad. The case also has provision to carry the counterweights but I recommend to carry then separately since them make the case too heavy and unbalanced. Before this case I kept the OTA and accessories in a big plastic box from Home depot and the tripod in the original cardboard box. That makes the scope too bulky and difficult to transport. Whereas this case is great for transportation and the thick padded design keep the stuff safe. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R Saragoni

customer_reviews.title: Would give a zero if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Was not 47 inches long. It did not fit my telescope. It doesn't even fit my camera tripod. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Carrier
customer_reviews.text: For the size it could have a couple of locations to Carry the lenses safely and a little more padding on the bottom. Just for thought. It does hold everything including the tripod. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Action

product_meta.title: Orion 15164 47x11x14 - Inches Padded Telescope Case
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Soft padded case protects your telescope and makes transport and storage easy. Internal padded divider separates optical tube from mount and tripod to prevent dings while a hook-and-loop fastener keeps counterweights in one place. Made of heavy, water-resistant polyester/nylon material with padding sewn into the inner case lining. Full-length zipper allows easy access for quick deployment and repacking of equipment in the field. Handle straps can easily be slung over your shoulder for convenient transport. Internal case dimensions: 47" L x 11" W x 14" H
feature_bullets: Soft padded case protects your telescope and makes transport and storage easy
Internal padded divider separates optical tube from mount and tripod to prevent dings while a hook-and-loop fastener keeps counterweights in one place
Made of heavy, water-resistant polyester/nylon material with padding sewn into the inner case lining
Full-length zipper allows easy access for quick deployment and repacking of equipment in the field. Handle straps can easily be slung over your shoulder for convenient transport
Internal case dimensions: 47" L x 11" W x 14" H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars69 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
